00015     return lhs += rhs;

00018  public:

00027 const static Position NORTH(-1, 0);
00028 const static Position NORTH_EAST(-1, 1);
00029 const static Position EAST(0, 1);
00030 const static Position SOUTH_EAST(1, 1);
00031 const static Position SOUTH(1, 0);
00032 const static Position SOUTH_WEST(1, -1);
00033 const static Position WEST(0, -1);
00034 const static Position NORTH_WEST(-1, -1);

00036 static const Position cnarr[] = {NORTH, NORTH_EAST, EAST, SOUTH_EAST, SOUTH, SOUTH_WEST, WEST, NORTH_WEST};
00037 static const Position fnarr[] = {NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST};
00038 static const vector<Position> conwayNeighbors(cnarr, cnarr + 8);
00039 static const vector<Position> fredkinNeighbors(fnarr, fnarr + 4);

00153 template <typename T>
00154 Life<T>::Life(istream& in) {
00155   generation = 0;
00156   population = 0;
00157   int rows;
00158   int cols;
00159   in >> rows;
00160   in >> cols >> ws;
00161   
00162   for(int r = 0; r < rows; r++) {
00163     grid.push_back(vector<T>());
00164     for(int c = 0; c < cols; c++) {
00165       char cell;
00166       in >> cell;
00167       grid[r].push_back(T(cell));
00168       if(grid[r][c])
00169         population++;
00170     }
00171     if(in)
00172       in >> ws;
00173   }
00174 }
00175 
00179 template <typename T>
00180 void Life<T>::takeTurn() {
00181   population = 0;
00182   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++)
00183     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++) {
00184       current.r = i;
00185       current.c = j;
00186       countNeighbors(grid[i][j]);
00187     }
00188   
00189   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++) {
00190     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++) {
00191       grid[i][j].turn();
00192       if (grid[i][j])
00193         population++;
00194     }
00195   }
00196   generation++;
00197 }
00198 
00203 template <typename T>
00204 void Life<T>::simulate(int numTurns) {
00205   while(numTurns-- > 0)
00206     takeTurn();
00207 }
00208 
00213 template <typename T>
00214 void Life<T>::print(ostream& out) {
00215   out << "Generation = " << generation << ", Population = " << population << "." << endl;
00216   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++) {
00217     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++)
00218       out << grid[i][j].name();
00219     out << endl;
00220   }
00221   out << endl;
00222 }
00223 
00228 template <typename T>
00229 void Life<T>::countNeighbors(T& cell) {
00230   vector<Position> adjacent = cell.neighbors();
00231   int numNeighbors = 0;
00232   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < adjacent.size(); i++) {
00233     numNeighbors += isAlive(adjacent[i]);
00234   }
00235   cell.setNeighbors(numNeighbors);
00236 }
00237 
00243 template <typename T>
00244 bool Life<T>::isAlive(Position adj) {
00245   Position p = current + adj;
00246   if(p.r < 0 || p.r >= (int)grid.size() || p.c < 0 || p.c >= (int)grid[0].size()) 
00247     return false;
00248   return grid[p.r][p.c];
00249 }

00259 void AbstractCell::setNeighbors(int n) {
00260   if(n < 0 || n > 8) throw(invalid_argument("n must be between 0 and 8, inclusive"));
00261   numNeighbors = n;
00262 }

00288 Cell::Cell(char c){
00289   if(c == '.'|| c == '*')
00290     ptr = new ConwayCell(c);
00291   else
00292     ptr = new FredkinCell(c);
00293 }

00299 Cell::Cell(const Cell& other) {
00300   if (!other.ptr)
00301     ptr = 0;
00302   else
00303     ptr = other.ptr->clone();

00325 void Cell::turn() {
00326   ptr->turn();
00327   if(*ptr == 2 && *ptr) {
00328     delete ptr;
00329     ptr = new ConwayCell('*');  
00330   }
00331 }

00373 ConwayCell::ConwayCell(char c) {
00374   if (c == '.')
00375     alive = false;
00376   else if (c == '*')
00377     alive = true;
00378 }
00379 
00383 void ConwayCell::turn() {
00384   if (numNeighbors == 3)
00385     alive = true;
00386   else if (numNeighbors < 2 || numNeighbors > 3)
00387     alive = false;
00388   else
00389     alive = alive; //do nothing
00390 }

00396 const vector<Position>& ConwayCell::neighbors() const {
00397   return conwayNeighbors;

00404 char ConwayCell::name() const {
00405   if(alive)
00406     return '*';
00407   return '.';
00408 }

00419 // ------------
00420 // Fredkin Cell
00421 // ------------
00422 
00427 FredkinCell::FredkinCell(char c) {
00428   age = 0;
00429   if (c == '-')
00430     alive = false;
00431   else {
00432     alive = true;
00433     age = c & 0xF;
00434   } 
00435 }
00436 
00440 void FredkinCell::turn() {
00441   if (numNeighbors % 2 == 1) {
00442     if(alive)
00443       age++;
00444     alive = true;
00445   }
00446   else
00447     alive = false;
00448 }
00449 
00454 const vector<Position>& FredkinCell::neighbors() const {
00455   return fredkinNeighbors;
00456 }
00457 
00462 char FredkinCell::name() const {
00463   if(!alive)
00464     return '-';
00465   if(age > 9)
00466     return '+';
00467   return (char) (age + 0x30);
00468 }

00474 FredkinCell::operator int() {
00475   return age;
